section.para: %LJ::DISABLED is a hash that defines parts of the installation that are CPU or database intensive as active or inactive. This following list briefly explains each option.

listitem.simpara: The Find Users by Similar Interests feature.
The user directory, which houses some of the largest and slowest database queries.
Logs the most recent updates to the stats page.
Logs the most recently created journals to the stats page.
Show the received and posted comment counts for each account on the userinfo.bml page.
Show the Add to Memories button on comment pages.
The topic directory, which hasn't yet been rewritten to support clustered installations.
Show the Tell a Friend button on comment pages.
Show the client usage statistics on the stats.bml page.
